CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.17.1, drugrecurreadministration (1N)
E2B (R3): G.k.9.i.4 Did Reaction Recur on Re-administration? Conformance: Optional Data Type: 1N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.16 Value Allowed: 1=yes – yes (rechallenge was done, reaction recurred) 2=yes – no (rechallenge was done, reaction did not recur) 3=yes – unk (rechallenge was done, outcome unknown) 4=no – n/a (no rechallenge was done, recurrence is not applicable)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unknown indicates that a rechallenge was done, but it is unknown if the event recurred. This segment should not be completed if it is unknown whether a rechallenge was done.
CustomField.label: Did Reaction Recur on Readministration?
